contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 28, 2009 D Silkeblæs
SilkeBlæs 100 Entertainments Contest SilkeBlæs silkebls
This contest is held every other year. Until 2002 it was held in even-numbered years. It was held in 2005 instead of 2004 and has since continued in odd-numbered years. The same happened in 2017/8, with the 2018 contest divided into sections.
Jysk Musik- og teaterhus, Silkeborg, Central Denmark, Denmark Performancepris: Nordvestjysk Brass Band, dirigent: Henrik Svenning Solistpris: Jens Overby, basun, Silkeborg Blæserne Nyskabende værk: Fly me to the moon, arr. Jan Sørensen, Nordvestjysk Bras Band
Sept. 4, 2011, 12:36 p.m. May 21, 2012, 8:50 p.m.
1 Concord Brass Band Kelly Crandell
2 Lyngby-Taarbaek Brass Band Christian Schmiedescamp
3 Århus Brass Band Arvid Anthun
4 Nordvestjysk Brass Band Henrik Svenning
5 Oresund Brass Band Unknown
